snippet.title: Incontinence and Nosey Family Members
snippet.description: ... Do you have one of those know-it-alls in your family? Spending Thanksgiving with my family members got me thinking about this (not that any of them are know-it-alls: wink-wink). Let's face it: we all have that certain family member who knows more than us on every single topic of discussion: and if you don't have that person in your family, then you may want to take a look in the mirror! I'm going to take a step back for the moment from one of my usual mantras of "don't be so afraid to tell your family about your incontinence - chances are that they'll understand". I very much still stand by this belief, but in many cases the problem goes from thinking they won't understand at all, to realizing that they think they understand far too much. You know what I'm talking about here: that person to whom you finally reveal your leakage, only to hear them go on and on (and on) about their second aunt's best friend's daughter-in-law, Judy.... ...

snippet.description: ... “I... don’t... feel... so... good...” I say as the room turns black and I start to fall on the kitchen floor.
